script.name: plugin.guilds.configmenu
script.sourceplaintext:
$guilds.config = get global variable: name='guilds.config' $page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds'
*write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Debug], fmt='Guilds Config - Obj=%s, Event=%s, Data=%s', $a.obj, $a.event, $a.data, null, null
$tTexts = table alloc $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=120 $tTexts['seta.resume'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=124 $tTexts['seta.sensitivity'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=126 $tTexts['gate.safety'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3025 $tTexts['marines.add'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=142 $tTexts['sector.colours'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=147 $tTexts['khaak.jobs'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=149 $tTexts['xenon.jobs'] = $read.text $tDesc = table alloc $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=121 $tDesc['seta.resume'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=125 $tDesc['seta.sensitivity'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=127 $tDesc['gate.safety'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3026 $tDesc['marines.add'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=146 $tDesc['sector.colours'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=148 $tDesc['khaak.jobs'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=150 $tDesc['xenon.jobs'] = $read.text
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Switch] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'guild.config.menu' $guilds.config[$selection] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] @ START [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.sectors : Object=null Event='reinit' Param=null Param2=null if $guilds.config['khaak.jobs'] set plot flag: 16384, on=[TRUE] else set plot flag: 16384, on=[FALSE] end if $guilds.config['xenon.jobs'] activate job: id=12110 activate job: id=12111 else deactivate job: id=12110 deactivate job: id=12111 end end
return null
sub.BuildMenu: $menu = create custom menu array
$name = 'seta.resume' gosub sub.AddYesNoSwitch
$name = 'seta.sensitivity' $value = 10 $value.add = 1 gosub sub.AddNumberSwitch
$name = 'gate.safety' $aValues = array alloc: size=4 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=128 $aValues[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=129 $aValues[1] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=130 $aValues[2] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=131 $aValues[3] = $read.text gosub sub.AddSwitch
$name = 'marines.add' $aValues = array alloc: size=5 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3020 $aValues[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3021 $aValues[1] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3022 $aValues[2] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3023 $aValues[3] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3024 $aValues[4] = $read.text gosub sub.AddSwitch
$name = 'sector.colours' $aValues = array alloc: size=3 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=143 $aValues[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=144 $aValues[1] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=145 $aValues[2] = $read.text gosub sub.AddSwitch
add section to custom menu: $menu $name = 'xenon.jobs' gosub sub.AddYesNoSwitch $name = 'khaak.jobs' gosub sub.AddYesNoSwitch
set menu option: $menu, icon=65
*$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=132 *add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=109 $player.name = get player name $callback = [Callback.Switch] $input = create input: id='guild.config.menu' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$player.name callback=$callback endsub
sub.AddDescription: $text = $tDesc[$name] if $text $sidemenu = create custom menu array add custom menu info line to array $sidemenu: text=$text $read.text = $tTexts[$name] set menu option: $sidemenu, description=$read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=122 set menu option: $sidemenu, set title text=$read.text set menu option: $sidemenu, icon=20 set menu line option: $menu, side menu=$sidemenu end endsub
sub.AddNumberSwitch: $aValues = array alloc: size=$value while $value dec $value = $v = $value do if $value.add $v = $value + $value.add $aValues[$value] = $v end gosub sub.AddSwitch endsub
sub.AddYesNoSwitch: $aValues = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102302 $aValues[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102301 $aValues[1] = $read.text gosub sub.AddSwitch endsub
sub.AddSwitch: $default = $guilds.config[$name] skip if $default $default = 0 gosub sub.AddDescription $read.text = $tTexts[$name] add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$aValues, default=$default, return id=$name, width=60 allowtabs=[FALSE] endsub
return null

line.comment: *write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Debug], fmt='Guilds Config - Obj=%s, Event=%s, Data=%s', $a.obj, $a.event, $a.data, null, null
*add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
